main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Neosho, Missouri on September 8, 1954.
interesting points: The object was saucer-shaped with four quadrate markings., The sighting lasted approximately 24 seconds., The object varied in speed and displayed unusual maneuvers., Military personnel from the 81st Fighter Interceptor Squadron were involved in the observation., Witness Louis Stephens reported seeing a bright light that oscillated and emitted a beam of light.
witness description: Louis Stephens, a 43-year-old pharmacist, observed a bright light in the western sky while driving.
